official_title: Small Media Interventions to Increase Colorectal Cancer Screening Among Chinese Americans
inclusion_criteria:
* Not up-to-date for colorectal cancer screening; self-identified as Chinese or Chinese American, or Asian who speak Chinese, or Asian born in China.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 50 Years
Must have maximum age of 75 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Not eligible for colorectal cancer screening for any reason.
